branchCategory.name: CM2
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CM2-Z stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and/or boss-cut type (up to 16 mm shorter). Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2-Z, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air Cylinder
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z double acting, single rod, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and/or boss-cut type (up to 16 mm shorter). Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2W-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z double acting, double rod, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2-Z, Air Cylinder, Single Acting, Spring Return/Extend
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z single acting, single rod, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2K-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z non-rotating single rod, double acting, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2KW-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z non-rotating double rod, double acting, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2R-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Direct Mount
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z block mount, single rod, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Rubber bumpers are standard. </p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2RK-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod, Direct Mount
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z block mount, single non-rotating rod, stainless steel cylinders are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Rubber bumpers are standard. </p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2Y-Z, Smooth Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2Y-Z smooth acting option are compact, lightweight and offer high performance. The smooth action option are excellent for low speed or low pressure applications. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch.</p>

branchItem.name: CM2-Z, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air Cylinder, Temperature Resistant Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z stainless steel cylinders with temperature options offer the same compact, lightweight and high performance as the standard CM2-Z. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and/or boss-cut type (up to 16 mm shorter). Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2-Z, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air Cylinder, Stroke Options
branchItem.description: <p>CM2-Z stroke options are great solutions for specialized applications but offer the same compact, lightweight and high performance. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. Transparent auto switch bracket provides visibility of the status of the switch. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and /or boss-cut (up to 16 mm shorter). Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2-Z, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air Cylinder, Environmental Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-Z stainless steel cylinders with environmental resistant options are designed for tough environments and offer the same compact, lightweight and high performance as the standard CM2-Z.  The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life.  The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods.  Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and /or boss-cut type (up to 16 mm shorter).  Rubber bumpers are standard.  The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options.</p> <p>

branchItem.name: C(D)M2-Z, Double Acting, Single Rod, Air Cylinder, Port Option
branchItem.description: <p>Series CM2-XC20 moves the rear port to an axial location and offers the same compact, lightweight and high performance as the standard CM2-Z. The piston seal and rod seal design provides excellent life. The CM2-Z series delivers extra flexibility including the option of male and female rods. Where space is at a premium, you can select a female rod end (up to 29 mm shorter) and /or boss-cut type (up to 16 mm shorter). Rubber bumpers are standard. The CM2-Z series offers a variety of mounting options</p>
